landing.title: Thola Iqembu Lakho Lezepolitiki
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo mayelana nemibono yakho yezepolitiki uthole ukuthi yiliphi iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika elihambisana nezindinganiso zakho.
landing.privacy: Izimpendulo zakho zigcinwa endaweni futhi azikaze zabiwe.

confidence.low: Ukufanana okubuthakathaka - cabangela ukubuyekeza wonke amaqembu

about.title: Mayelana ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela ebanzi, esekelwe ebufakazini yokufanisa imibono yakho yezepolitiki namaqembu aseyipolitiki aseNingizimu Afrika. Uhlelo lwethu lwenzelwe ukuba nolungile, lusobala, futhi lungahlanganyeli kwezepolitiki.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engu-28 eyakhiwe ngokucophelela emboza izindawo ezinkulu zenqubomgomo kufaka phakathi ukunakekelwa kwempilo, imfundo, umnotho, ukuphatha, nezindaba zomphakathi. Umbuzo ngamunye wenzelwe ukuveza okokhetha kwakho kwezepolitiki ngaphandle kokuchema kwaqembu.
about.scoringText: Impendulo ngayinye oyinikayo ifaniswa nezikhundla zamaqembu ezibhaliwe ezivela emibhalweni yesemthethweni yamaqembu, emibhalweni yenqubomgomo, nezitatimende zomphakathi. Amaqembu athola amaphuzu alinganisiwe ngokuya ngokuhambisana kwezikhundla zawo ezikhulunywayo nezimpendulo zakho. La maphuzu alinganiswa esikalini esingu-0-100, nentando yakho ephezulu nezinye indlela kuchazwe kahle. Sikupha futhi isilinganiso sokwethemba ukusiza ukuqonda ukuthi ukufana kwakho kuqinile kangakanani.
about.transparencyText: Zonke izikhundla zamaqembu nezisisindo samaphuzu zinqunywa ngocwaningo oluqinile lwemibhalo esemthethweni yamaqembu. Indlela yethu ivulelekile futhi ingabuyekezwa. Asikhethi noma yiliphi iqembu lezepolitiki noma isistimu yemibono - inhloso yethu kuphela ukusiza wenze izinqumo ezinolwazi ezisekelwe emibalweni yakho nezikhundla ezimenywe wamaqembu.
about.dataSourcesText: Izikhundla zamaqembu zicutshungulwa ngokucophelela emibhalweni esemthethweni yamaqembu, emibhalweni yenqubomgomo, amarekhodi okuvota eparlamende, nezitatimende zomphakathi eziqinisekisiwe. Sibuyekeza idatha yethu njalo ukubonisa izinguquko zenqubomgomo. Zonke izinto zemithombo zivela kumashaneli asemthethweni wamaqembu noma izinhlangano zezindaba ezihloniphekile. Uma ukholelwa ukuthi noma iluphi olwazi alunembile, samukela izilungiso ngemibhalo efanele.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho bubaluleke kakhulu. Sikholelwa ukuthi imibono yakho yezepolitiki ingokwakho kakhulu futhi ifanelwe izinga eliphezulu lokuvikelwa.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi amakhukhi, ama-analytics pixels, noma noma yimuphi ubuchwepheshe bokulandelela. Asikwazi ukubona izimpendulo zakho, asikwazi ukukubona, futhi asinayo intshisekelo yokwenza njalo. Izimpendulo zakho zemibuzo azithunyelwa kumaseva ethu.
about.localOnlyText: Konke kwenzeka kusiphequluli sakho. Izimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kuphela kudivaysi yakho futhi kungekho kwenye indawo. Uma usula idatha yesiphequluli sakho, imiphumela yakho iyalahleka unomphelo - asinayo isibuyekezo ngoba asisikaze sibe nazo ekuqaleni.
about.sharingText: Uma ushayela imiphumela, izimpendulo zakho zifakwa ngqo kwithu le-URL ngokwalo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ubani onalelo link angabona imiphumela yakho, kodwa idatha ayithinti amaseva ethu. Ulawula ukuthi ubani obona imiphumela yakho ngokubeka ubani othola leyo link. Sula i-link, futhi imiphumela yakho ingokwakho futhi.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa i-Cloudflare Web Analytics, isevisi yama-analytics ebeka ubumfihlo kuqala engasebenzisi amakhukhi, engalandeli abantu ngabanye kumawebhusayithi, futhi engaqoqi noma iluphi ulwazi lomuntu oluhlonzekayo. Isinikeza izibalo eziyisisekelo ezihlanganisiwe (njengokubuka ikhasi eliphelele) ukusisiza siqonde ukuthi iwebhusayithi iyasetshenziswa yini, ngaphandle kokubeka ubumfihlo bakho engozini. I-Cloudflare ayikwazi ukubona izimpendulo zakho zemibuzo noma ukukubona wena mathupha.
about.partiesText: Sihlanganisa amaqembu amakhulu ayi-14 aseyipolitiki aseNingizimu Afrika amele imibono ehlukene kulo lonke uhla lwezepolitiki. Ukukhetha kwethu kusekelwe ekumelweni kweparlamende, ukubaluleka kokhetho, nokuhlukahluka kwemibono.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lemfundo, akusiyo indawo yocwaningo. Amaqembu ezepolitiki ayizinhlangano eziyinkimbinkimbi ezinemibono ethintana kakhulu eguquka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Sikukhuthaza kakhulu ukuthi ufunde imibhalo yamaqembu, uhambe emihlanganweni yomphakathi, futhi uqinisekise ulwazi lwethu ngokuzimele. Leli thuluzi likhombisa ukuvumelana okusekelwe ezikhundleni ezikhulunywayo - ukuphatha kwangempela kungahluka. Sebenzisa le miphumela njengokukuqala kokuhlola okujulile, hhayi njengesinqumo sakho sokugcina.
about.viewDataText: Ngomoya wokucaca ngokugcwele, ungahlola amafayela edatha yethu ngokwakho. La mafayela e-JSON aqukethe zonke izikhundla zamaqembu, isisindo samaphuzu, nemetadata yemibuzo esetshenziswa yi-algorithm yethu.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress iyiqembu elibusayo eNingizimu Afrika, elikhuthaza intando yeningi yomphakathi, uguquko, kanye nokubhekana nokungalingani ngokusebenzisa ukungenelela kukahulumeni.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance ikhuthaza intando yeningi yenkululeko, ezomnotho zemakethe yamahhala, kanye nezepolitiki ezingenalo ubuhlanga ngokugcizelela ukubusa okuhle nokudala imisebenzi.

mk.desc: I-uMkhonto we Sizwe Party igxile ekuguquleni kwezomnotho ngokuqinile, ikhuthaza ukuthuthukiswa okuholwa uhulumeni kanye nokubhekana nokungalungi komlando.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters iyiqembu elikwesokunxele kakhulu elikhuthaza uguquko lwezomnotho oluqinile, ukwenza kwezwe kanye nokwabiwana komhlaba ngaphandle kwenhlawulo.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhuthaza amasiko amaZulu, i-federalism, kanye nezomnotho zemakethe yamahhala ezinemibandela yomphakathi.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance igxile ekubhekaneni nezindaba zokufuduka, ikhuthaza ubuntu bezwe laseNingizimu Afrika, kanye nokubeka phambili izidingo zezakhamuzi.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus imele izintshisekelo zama-Afrikaner, ikhuthaza i-federalism, amalungelo encinyane, kanye nezindinganiso zokugcina.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA iyiqembu elisemaphakathi eligxile ekubuseni okungokoqobo, ekulweni nenkohlakalo, kanye nokukhula kwezomnotho ngokubambisana nomkhakha wangasese.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ikhuthaza izindinganiso zobuKristu, izinqubomgomo zomphakathi ezigcinayo, kanye nentando yeningi yomthethosisekelo.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekuhlanganiseni abantu ngaphansi kanye nokubhekana nezinkinga zemiphakathi yendawo ngezinqubomgomo eziqhubekayo.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party ikhuthaza ubuntu, amalungelo abasebenzi, kanye nokuguqukela emphakathini wobuntu ngokuphatha kukahulumeni.

udm.desc: I-United Democratic Movement ikhuthaza intando yeningi yomphakathi, ukubuyisana, kanye nezinqubomgomo ezingokoqobo zokuqeda ubumpofu nokungalingani.

aljamah.desc: I-Al Jama-ah imele izindinganiso zobuIslam futhi imele ubulungiswa bomphakathi, ukubusa okunokuziphatha, namalungelo emiphakathi ecindezelwe.

cope.desc: I-Congress of the People ikhuthaza intando yeningi yomphakathi, ukubusa okuhle, kanye nezinqubomgomo zezomnotho ezilinganisa ukukhula nenhlalakahle yomphakathi.

q1.text: Uhlelo lokunakekelwa kwempilo oluxhaswa ngumphakathi (uhlelo lwe-National Health Insurance) kufanele lusungulwe ukunikeza ukunakekelwa kwamahhala kubo bonke.

q2.text: Imfundo ephakeme kufanele ibe mahhala kubo bonke abafundi (ayikho imali), hhayi nje usizo lwezimali oluhlolwayo.

q3.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asebenzise isibonelelo semali esingagunyaziwe kubo bonke izakhamuzi, ngisho noma kudinga izintela eziphezulu noma ukuboleka.

q4.text: Uhulumeni kufanele atshale kakhulu ezindlini zomphakathi zemindeni engenayo imali eningi.

q5.text: Ukutshalwa kwezimali ezindlini zomphakathi kufanele kube yinto ebalulekile ngisho noma kudinga ukunciphisa ezinye izinsizakalo zomphakathi.

q6.text: Uhulumeni kufanele akhuphule izintela kubantu abanothileyo ukuxhasa izinhlelo zomphakathi ezingeziwe (ezempilo, imfundo nezibonelelo zomphakathi).

q7.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke phambili izivumelwano zohwebo ezivikela izimboni zasekhaya, ngisho noma kusho amanani aphezulu kubathengi.

q8.text: Impahla yangasese namalungelo amabhizinisi amancane kufanele avikelwe ngokuqinile ekuthathweni nasemithethweni enzima.

q9.text: Uhulumeni kufanele adale izinhlelo ezinkulu zemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa umsebenzi ukunciphisa ukungaqashwa.

q10.text: Abasebenzi kufanele babe namalungelo aqinile okushayela nokuxoxisana ngqo nabaqashi ngaphandle kokungenelela kukahulumeni.

q11.text: I-BEE kanye nokwenza ngokubuyisana kufanele kuqhubeke kube yizinto ezibalulekile kuhulumeni ukubuyisela ukungalingani kobuhlanga kwezomnotho.

q12.text: Ukuthathwa komhlaba wangasese ngaphandle kokukhokhelwa kwenani lemakethe kufanele kuvunyelwe ngaphansi komthetho ukusheshisa ukuguqulwa komhlaba.

q13.text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya nokusekela ezolimo (okuhlanganisa izibonelelo nezingqalasizinda zabalimi abancane) kufanele kuthole uxhaso olukhulu luka hulumeni.

q14.text: Izwe kufanele libeke phambili ukutshalwa kwezimali emandleni avuselelekayo (ilanga, umoya) kunokwandisa amandla amalahle.

q16.text: Umthethosisekelo kufanele uchitshiyelwe lapho kudingeka ukusheshisa uguquko nokuvumela ukwabiwa okuqhubekayo.

q17.text: Isenzo esinamandla esilwa nenkohlakalo (ngisho noma kuphazamisa abaholi bamanje) kubaluleke kunokugcina ukuzinza kwezepolitiki.

q18.text: Ukuzimela kwezinkantolo kanye nezikhathi zokushushisa kufanele kuvikelwe ngokuqinile, ngisho noma lokho kunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwesigqila.

q21.text: Ukunciphisa ubugebengu, uhulumeni kufanele agxile ekujeziseni okunamandla kunokubhekana nezimbangela zomphakathi njengobumpofu.

q22.text: Abafiki abangekho emthethweni kufanele baxoshwe bese kulawulwa imingcele eqinile ukuvikela imisebenzi nezinsiza zendawo.

q23.text: Uhulumeni kufanele aqinise ukuvikelwa komthetho kwabantu be-LGBTQ+ futhi athuthukise amalungelo alinganayo asakhamuzi.

q15.text: Uhulumeni kufanele utshale imali ngokushesha ekulungiseni ingqalasizinda yamanzi nokuhlanzwa (amapayipi, izindawo zokuhlanza) kumasipala angenile.

q19.text: iNingizimu Afrika idinga izinguquko eziqinile zokuthatha umbuso, ezihlanganisa ukulawula okuqinile kwenkxaso-mali yeqembu lezombusazwe kanye nomthelela wezinkampani kuhulumeni.

q20.text: Izifundazwe nomasipala kufanele banandla eningeziwe nokulawula isabelomali, ngisho noma kusho ukunciphisa igunya likahulumeni kazwelonke.

q24.text: Izimiso zenkolo nemfundiso kufanele zibe nomthelela omkhulu ekwakhiweni kwemithetho nenqubomgomo kahulumeni.

q25.text: iNingizimu Afrika kufanele ihloniphe ngokusemthethweni futhi ixhase izakhiwo zobuholi bendabuko (amakhosi namakhosi) njengengxenye yokubusa.

q26.text: Uhulumeni kufanele unikeze uxhaso olungeziwe nezimali ezingeziwe zezilimi zomdabu emfundweni, ezindabeni nasezinsizakalweni zomphakathi.

q27.text: iNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke phambili ukubambisana kokudiplomasi kanye nokuhweba okubanzi (ne-EU, i-US nabomakhelwane base-Afrika) kunokuhambisana namaqembu ezombangazwe angaphandle.

q28.text: Uhulumeni kufanele andise amandla okuqapha nokufinyelela kudatha kwabasemthethweni ukulwa nobugebengu nobandulkwane, ngisho noma kunciphisa ubumfihlo.

q29.text: Abortion should be legal, publicly funded where necessary, and available on request.

q30.text: The state should prioritise keeping key public utilities (power, water, rail) in public ownership rather than selling them to private firms.

q31.text: The government should actively fund and protect Afrikaans language education and cultural programmes.

q32.text: Government should make active legal and practical accommodations for religious minorities, including Muslim practices and holidays.

q33.text: The government should introduce specific legal protections and targeted support to preserve the rights and cultures of national minorities.

q34.text: The government should prioritise paying down public debt and ensuring fiscal sustainability even if it limits new social spending.

q35.text: Immigration policy should be significantly tightened including stronger border controls and stricter vetting.
